title: Add a Machinery showcase for husk machine processing with improved colors

requirements.text: Add a new “Machinery” content block to the existing Process section to showcase the key machines used for varagu/kodo millet husk processing (e.g., husk/dehusking machine, separator/cleaner, packaging/packing machine) with clear English titles and short descriptions.

quotes: use machineries in good clor- husk machne

acceptanceCriteria: The Process section includes a clearly labeled “Machinery” block visible on the page without adding a new route.
The block contains at least 3 machinery items, each with an English title and 1–2 sentence description focused on husk processing.
Layout is responsive (single column on mobile, multi-column grid on wider screens).

requirements.text: Apply a “good color” treatment to the new Machinery block by using the existing design tokens (primary/accent/card/border) to create clear visual hierarchy (icon/image area, title, body text) while preserving the site’s pure white page background requirement.

quotes: use machineries in good clor- husk machne

acceptanceCriteria: All Machinery block containers remain on white page background (no tinted/gray section backgrounds).
Machinery cards use consistent token-based colors (e.g., primary for emphasis, subtle accent backgrounds) with readable contrast for text.
No changes introduce non-white full-bleed backgrounds or gradients.

requirements.text: Generate and add static machinery illustrations/photos (as simple, clean visuals) and render them in the Machinery block from the frontend public assets directory (do not serve images from the backend).

quotes: use machineries in good clor- husk machne

acceptanceCriteria: All required images are added under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the Machinery block.
Images are displayed with appropriate alt text in English.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything in frontend/src/components/ui (compose instead of editing).
Respect the existing project requirement that the site background remains pure white across all sections (no tinted section backgrounds, gradients, or full-screen background images).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; no additional backend services.
nonGoals: Add or change backend APIs or persistence related to machinery.
Add authentication, dashboards, admin editing, or any CMS-like functionality.

required: Clean flat illustration of a husk/dehusking machine with neutral background (husk-machine-01.dim_1200x800.png)
Clean flat illustration of a grain/husk separator/cleaner machine with neutral background (separator-machine-01.dim_1200x800.png)
Clean flat illustration of a packaging/packing machine with neutral background (packing-machine-01.dim_1200x800.png)
